==Generate deployable service artifacts for VP 1.3.x==

*Description*

A script to generate deployable jar files for the Virtualized Platform (VP 1.3.x).

*Prerequisites*

Java is installed and JAVA_HOME is set in environment.

Requires [http://groovy.codehaus.org/ groovy] 1.8.2 or newer. [http://groovy.codehaus.org/Installing+Groovy See groovy installation instructions]

You need to install Maven service archetype in order to run the script

 # cd `/skltpservices/tools/generators/archetypes/trunk/ServiceArchetype`
 # mvn install

*To create service virtualizations*

 # Download RIV TA zip with the service contracts and unzip it
 # Download [https://code.google.com/p/skltpservices/source/browse/#svn%2Ftools%2Fgenerators%2Fscripts%2Ftrunk files needed for running] 
 # Update pomtemplate.xml with correct groupid and artifactid depending on what domain/subdomain is used and what version of RIV TA contract is used
 # Run {{{ $./VirtualiseringGenerator.groovy <path to unzipped RIV TA file, schemas folder> }}}

You can run the script to get further information in parameters and usage, to run on different environemnts see below:

On Linux/mac termianl run _`<path to script folder>./VirtualiseringGenerator.groovy`_ 

On Windos terminal run _`<path to script folder> groovy VirtualiseringGenerator.groovy`_
